titleStmt.title: Ergon pseudous kai misthos alētheias, or, The wicked mans sad disappointment and the righteous mans sure recompence being a sermon preached the 17th day of October, 1661, at the solemn funerals of the Right Worshipful Sir Abraham Raynardson, Knight, late alderman of London / by George Smalwood.
titleStmt.author: Smalwood, George, 1604-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ame Hunt for William Hope ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
